Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizza.src.Pizza
Direct Known Subclasses:
BBQChicken, BuildYourOwn, ChicagoPizza, Deluxe, Meatzza, NYPizza
public abstract class Pizza extends Object
The Pizza class represents a pizza object with a specific crust, size, and toppings. It provides methods to manage these properties and calculate the price based on the pizza type, size, and toppings. This class serves as the base class for specific pizza types like Deluxe, BBQChicken, Meatzza, and BuildYourOwn, allowing the use of polymorphism for price calculations. This is an abstract class, and specific pizza types should extend it and implement the price method.
Author:
Raashi Maheshwari, Tanvi Yamarthy

    • price

      public abstract double price()
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to calculate the price of the pizza.
      Returns:
      The price of the pizza based on its size, crust, and toppings.

    • addTopping

      public void addTopping(Topping topping)
      Adds a topping to the pizza. A maximum of 7 toppings can be added for "Build Your Own" pizzas.
      Parameters:
      topping - The topping to add to the pizza.

    • getToppings

      public ArrayList<Topping> getToppings()
      Gets the list of toppings for this pizza.
      Returns:
      The list of toppings on this pizza.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      Calculates the price of the pizza based on its type, size, and toppings. The price varies depending on the specific pizza type (Deluxe, BBQChicken, Meatzza, or BuildYourOwn).
      Returns:
      The price of the pizza based on the size, crust, and toppings.
